This is my honest review.

The game is still fun to play occasionally with friends, but a high trust factor is a must (if you play matchmaking). After LE you will constantly meet cheaters or griefers, even if your trust factor is good. This is why I would strongly reccomend newer players to practice in leagues, there they can actually play in a cheat-free environment and evolve along the way.
If you agree with my review, please react to it, so newer players can see this.
